svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - February 3 2024
February 3 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
February 3, 2024" date: "2024-02-03"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .Â Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim : Mainnet : Dencun
upgrade date to be set on ACDC next week; assumes no issues with HoleÅ¡ky testnet upgrade, Goerli blob expiry & churn limit testing and
Devnet 12 blob spamming Sepolia testnet : uneventfully upgraded to Dencun, blobs are flowing Prague upgrade : Discussions on including EOF
or EIP4444 (bound historical data) and how Portal network could distribute historical data; scope to be finalized on ACDE in two weeks
Osaka upgrade: Verkle agreed as core feature; Verkle overview & current status :Â ~2 weeks to build Verkle tree prior to upgrade &
execution 10% slower
â€¢ Mainnet : Dencun upgrade date to be set on ACDC next week; assumes no issues with HoleÅ¡ky testnet upgrade, Goerli blob expiry & churn
limit testing and Devnet 12 blob spamming
Mainnet : Dencun upgrade date to be set on ACDC next week; assumes no issues with HoleÅ¡ky testnet upgrade, Goerli blob expiry & churn
â€¢ Sepolia testnet : uneventfully upgraded to Dencun, blobs are flowing
Sepolia testnet : uneventfully upgraded to Dencun, blobs are flowing
â€¢ Prague upgrade : Discussions on including EOF or EIP4444 (bound historical data) and how Portal network could distribute historical
data; scope to be finalized on ACDE in two weeks
Prague upgrade : Discussions on including EOF or EIP4444 (bound historical data) and how Portal network could distribute historical data;
scope to be finalized on ACDE in two weeks
â€¢ Osaka upgrade: Verkle agreed as core feature; Verkle overview & current status :Â ~2 weeks to build Verkle tree prior to upgrade &
Osaka upgrade (meta EIP7607 )
â€¢ Kaustinen testnet (Verkle) rebooted with new features & fixes
Kaustinen testnet (Verkle) rebooted with new features & fixes
â€¢ Verkle implementers call video & notes
Verkle implementers call video & notes
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.82% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.82% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 78% supermajority, could cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm
39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality Research starting for validators to provide client info privately
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth 78% supermajority, could cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 78% supermajority, could cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 39%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Research starting for validators to provide client info privately
Research starting for validators to provide client info privately
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Research
â€¢ Unconditional inclusion lists (for censorship resistance): transactions are included in a first or second slot, otherwise they are
unconditionally added in order to the bottom of the second slot
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.15.0 : fixes for Deneb upgrade, js-libp2p updated to v1 and minor fixes for UX & performance improvements
Nimbus v24.2.0 : stability improvements for Deneb Prysm v4.2.1 : older CPUs without AVX support will have failures on testnets
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Lodestar v1.15.0 : fixes for Deneb upgrade, js-libp2p updated to v1 and minor fixes for UX & performance improvements
Lodestar v1.15.0 : fixes for Deneb upgrade, js-libp2p updated to v1 and minor fixes for UX & performance improvements
â€¢ Nimbus v24.2.0 : stability improvements for Deneb
Nimbus v24.2.0 : stability improvements for Deneb
â€¢ Prysm v4.2.1 : older CPUs without AVX support will have failures on testnets
Prysm v4.2.1 : older CPUs without AVX support will have failures on testnets
â€¢ Execution layer: Erigon v2.57.2 : fix for RpcDaemon seeing recently retired blocks
Execution layer:
â€¢ Erigon v2.57.2 : fix for RpcDaemon seeing recently retired blocks
Support the Roman Storm & Alex Pertsev legal defense fund
The Biden administration is attempting to criminalize open source software development as part of its war on crypto.
Donate to defend our innocent Ethereum heroes .Â Retweet to spread awareness .
Layer 2
â€¢ Arbitrum One ArbOS v11 live, adds Shanghai support (including PUSH0)
Arbitrum One ArbOS v11 live, adds Shanghai support (including PUSH0)
â€¢ Optimism bicameral governance for upgrades , citizens house can veto [Andrew is a badgeholder]
Optimism bicameral governance for upgrades , citizens house can veto [Andrew is a badgeholder]

multi-dimensional pricing

pricing
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs: EIP7605 : Homogeneous validator penalty Meta EIP7607 : Hardfork Meta - Osaka EIP7609 : Decrease TLOAD/TSTORE pricing EIP7610 :
Revert creation in case of non-empty storage

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Remix v0.42 : Solidity v0.8.24 now default and GPT help for Circom compiler errors
Remix v0.42 : Solidity v0.8.24 now default and GPT help for Circom compiler errors

GasliteVest : continuous linear token vesting base contract

Brownie v1.20.0 (Python): no longer actively maintained

Napalm : productivity framework for custom Solidity vulnerability detectors
â€¢ Farcaster Frames : mini apps in posts using an image & buttons to trigger callbacks Frame verifier (Solidity): encode/verify MessageData
structs containing Frame actions OnchainKit FrameKit (TypeScript): get Frame HTML, message and metadata
Farcaster Frames : mini apps in posts using an image & buttons to trigger callbacks

mesc v0.2 : configure & manage RPC endpoints

Security
â€¢ ERC1271 (signature validation for contracts) replay disclosure , possible when the signed digest doesn't include the smart account
address
ERC1271 (signature validation for contracts) replay disclosure , possible when the signed digest doesn't include the smart account address
â€¢ Abracadabraâ€™s Magic Internet Money $6.5M exploit via rounding error
Abracadabraâ€™s Magic Internet Money $6.5M exploit via rounding error
Enterprise
â€¢ Karen Scarbrough is the new interim Executive Director of Enterprise Ethereum Alliance

EF seek an Executive Assistant to support senior decision makers
â€¢ Nethermind: Distributed System Engineer , Lead Engineer , Protocol Researcher

Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 6.4 to 152.8 gwei, with 19.7 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei 1.8k ETH net
issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 6.4 to 152.8 gwei, with 19.7 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 22.0 gwei

1.8k ETH net issuance this week

ETHUSD : $2,243 - $2,380, currently $2,307
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ ENS gasless DNSSEC live, configure DNS names that support DNSSEC to work with ENS
